item.title: Final Project
item.description: Project Changes for Spring 2018 The final project instructions will be undergoing revision for Spring 2018. The instructions, data, and groups on GitHub should not be considered current yet. Core Files Data Directions Groups Overview The final project for this course requires students to clean and map non-emergency call data from the City of St. Louis. These data describe the presence of various types of problems in City neighborhoods.
